import axios from"../../axios-orders";import*as actionTypes from"./actionTypes";export var addIngredient=function addIngredient(name){return{type:actionTypes.ADD_INGREDIENT,ingredientName:name};};export var removeIngredient=function removeIngredient(name){return{type:actionTypes.REMOVE_INGREDIENT,ingredientName:name};};export var setIngredients=function setIngredients(ingredients){return{type:actionTypes.SET_INGREDIENTS,ingredients:ingredients};};export var fetchIngredientsFailed=function fetchIngredientsFailed(){return{type:actionTypes.FETCH_INGREDIENTS_FAILED};};export var initIngredients=function initIngredients(token){return function(dispatch){axios.get("https://broject-burger-default-rtdb.firebaseio.com/ingredients.json?auth="+token).then(function(response){dispatch(setIngredients(response.data));// this.setState({ ingredients: response.data });
}).catch(function(error){dispatch(fetchIngredientsFailed());});};};
